name: Hiking
description: Explore scenic trails and enjoy the great outdoors.

name: Camping
description: Experience the tranquility of nature under the stars.

name: Rock Climbing
description: Challenge yourself on natural and artificial rock formations.

name: Mountain Biking
description: Navigate rugged terrain and downhill trails on two wheels.

name: Kayaking
description: Paddle through calm lakes or thrilling whitewater rapids.

name: White Water Rafting
description: Conquer fast-flowing rivers and navigate challenging rapids.

name: Canoeing
description: Enjoy a leisurely paddle in serene waters or adventurous expeditions.

name: Backpacking
description: Embark on multi-day treks with all you need on your back.

name: Trail Running
description: Combine running and hiking on scenic trails and mountain paths.

name: Zip Lining
description: Experience the thrill of flying on high-speed zip lines.

name: Paragliding
description: Soar through the skies while suspended from a parachute-like wing.

name: Skydiving
description: Jump from an aircraft and freefall before deploying a parachute.

name: Cave Exploration
description: Delve into underground caves and discover hidden wonders.

name: Snowboarding
description: Carve through fresh powder on snowy mountain slopes.

name: Skiing
description: Glide down pristine ski slopes amid breathtaking scenery.

name: Surfing
description: Ride the waves and catch the perfect surf along coastlines.

name: Snorkeling
description: Explore underwater ecosystems with just a mask and snorkel.

name: Scuba Diving
description: Dive deep into the ocean to witness marine life and reefs.

name: Windsurfing
description: Combine elements of surfing and sailing on a windsurfing board.

name: Kiteboarding
description: Harness the power of the wind while riding a kiteboard on water.

name: Sailing
description: Set sail on a boat or yacht and explore coastal or open waters.

name: Fishing Expeditions
description: Embark on fishing adventures in various water bodies.

name: Wildlife Safaris
description: Observe wildlife in their natural habitats on guided safaris.

name: Photography Tours
description: Capture stunning landscapes and wildlife through photography.

name: Hot Air Ballooning
description: Take to the skies in a hot air balloon for scenic aerial views.

name: Bungee Jumping
description: Leap from heights with a bungee cord for an adrenaline rush.

name: Hang Gliding
description: Glide through the air using a lightweight non-motorized glider.

name: Off-Roading
description: Navigate rugged terrains in 4x4 vehicles or off-road motorcycles.

name: Horseback Riding
description: Explore scenic landscapes on horseback with guided tours.

name: Dog Sledding
description: Experience the thrill of dog-powered sled rides in snowy regions.

name: Ice Climbing
description: Scale frozen waterfalls and ice formations in icy environments.

name: Spelunking (Cave Diving)
description: Explore underground caves, tunnels, and chambers.

name: Ski Touring
description: Backcountry skiing adventures through untracked snow.

name: Sandboarding
description: Slide down sand dunes on a sandboard for desert fun.

name: Surf Fishing
description: Cast a line from the shoreline and reel in the catch of the day.

name: Trekking
description: Embark on long-distance hikes through diverse landscapes.

name: Snowshoeing
description: Explore snowy terrains with snowshoes for added stability.

name: Kite Surfing
description: Combine elements of kite flying and surfing on the water.

name: Spearfishing
description: Hunt fish underwater using a spear gun or snorkeling equipment.

name: Mountain Boarding
description: Ride down slopes and trails on a mountain board.

name: Wilderness Survival Training
description: Learn essential survival skills in the great outdoors.

name: Glacier Hiking
description: Explore glaciers and ice formations with guided hikes.

name: Mushroom Foraging
description: Hunt for edible mushrooms in forests and woodlands.

name: Geocaching
description: Participate in a GPS-based treasure hunting adventure.

name: Stand-Up Paddleboarding (SUP)
description: Paddle while standing on a board in calm waters.

name: Kite Buggying
description: Ride a buggy powered by a kite for land-based thrills.
